1831. Jan. 1. Sa. Self-Complacency, p. 10: Phrenology, p. 4. Homer, v. 421. Uwins calls: call on S Hodgets
. 47 ½ / 51

Jan. 2. Su. Phrenology, 8 lines. Letter to W Cross . Homer, v. 493: Moore, Byron, Vol. II, p. 42. Call on Isa. Booth
. Warm Bath, W . 48 ½ / 50 ½

3. M. Byron, p. 174. W Calls: Cookes sup; adv. Uwins
. 48 / 50 ½

4. Tu. Homer, v. 544: Byron, p. 234. Call on Brayley (adv. Britton & Jones ) &
Levison
: M W S dines; adv. Hodgets
: Uwins calls, & Booth . Warm Bath. 48 ½ / 50

10. M. Astronomy, revise. Byron, p. 720. M Gisbne
& M n call: dine at C Jones’s , w. Lloyds, Rileys, Aldises, & Mes Booth & Gardner; invités Maugham & Wilkses, M P
. Bannister, & Barnet, & Dell .48 ½ / 50

M calls. 46 ½ / 49

n, w. note

n, w. note
, &
M W S
: dine at C Jones’s , w. Maughams & Wilkses : N G at tea n . Mackenzie dies . 48 ½ / 50

R T

Nemours elected K of Belgians. 43 ½ / 47 ½

: M W S at tea. Bedchamber cleaned, 11 1/2 A M. 58 ½ / 63 ½

n : Mes Wood & Green call: sup at Reynolds’s , w. Helen & Stella Boaden .
ecris mal .
59 ½ / 64

n &
Rodd
n : A Smith calls n : N G at tea: theatre, 1/2 W Tell , & Stanfield; adv. Cookes

Northcote ; adv. Constable
. A Smith calls. 55 / 60

M W S’s

na . 51 ½ / 57

Mackintosh
:
Pickersgill’s , w. miss Crump, Martin, Witshen, Owen, Bowring, Granville, Macfarlane, Poole, Hill
52 ½ / 56 ½

22. Tu. Homer, v. 210: Montaigne, çala.
A Smith n & Cooke : call on Gisborne
. Thoughts on Man, copies delivered. 50 / 52 ½

23. W. Homer, v. 312: Abydos.
A Smith & W call: call on
H Holm
n : meet Reynolds : sup at Jacob’s
. 49 ½ / 55

: call on Maugham
n : sup at Hodgets’
. illeg. 50 ½ / 56 ½
25. F. Homer, v. 515: Walpole, p. 120, fin. Mauvaise nuit . 53 / 58

26. Sa. Homer, v. 625: Chenevix.
Holm & A S call. List of consulters. Letter fr. EGrey : write to Mackintosh . 53 ½ / 58

R T
n , &
Booth ; adv. Rowbotham
: W calls. 52 ½ / 57 ½

: Stevenson , Kirklands n & C Landseer call: tea

,
mrs Kirkland
&
Northcote

Letter Write to Sir W Scott . Homer, v. 271. Dine at Woodifield’s , w. Lavigne, mrs Heatley & another . M calls n . 58 / 61 ½

Bien . 58 / 63

:
Salter tea & supper. 59 / 61

Cooke ; adv. Shaw & 3

100
